source: { case 0x9d : case 0xcf : return 1; case 0x66 : case 0x67 : continue; case 0x26 : case 0x2e : case 0x36 : case 0x3e : case 0x64 : case 0x65 : case 0xf0 : case 0xf2 : case 0xf3 : continue; case 0x9c : default : return 0; }

{ asm volatile (".global kretprobe_trampoline
" "kretprobe_trampoline: 
" " pushf
" " subl $12, %esp
" " pushl %fs
" " pushl %ds
" " pushl %es
" " pushl %eax
" " pushl %ebp
" " pushl %edi
" " pushl %esi
" " pushl %edx
" " pushl %ecx
" " pushl %ebx

" " movl 52(%esp), %edx
" " movl %edx, 48(%esp)
" " movl %eax, 52(%esp)
" " popl %ebx
" " popl %ecx
" " popl %edx
" " popl %esi
" " popl %edi
" " popl %ebp
" " popl %eax

" " ret
